name: I AM MUSIC
description: I Am Music" is the third studio album by American rapper Playboi Carti, released on March 14, 2025. It's a 30-track, 77-minute album categorized as trap music, with a mix of rage-fueled tracks and more polished, mainstream-leaning collaborations according to a review on Medium. The album features guest appearances from artists like Kendrick Lamar, Future, Young Thug, and Travis Scott.
